Hero.description: The community-driven high frequency exchange. Real-time data, instant sorting, and zero latency.
Hero.panel_item_1_desc: Streamed from players every few seconds.
Hero.panel_item_3_desc: Sort, refresh, and act without lag.

Submit.title: Submit Entry
Submit.description: Share your Lingbao price with the community.
Submit.signin_prompt: Sign in to share your Lingbao price. You can still view the live market without an account.

Feed.title: Market Stream
Feed.subtitle: Live listings from the community
Feed.error: Unable to connect to market stream.
Feed.empty: No listings yet. Be the first to share!

Features.speed_desc: Built for high frequency sharing and instant visibility.
Features.trust_desc: Every submission is community-driven and verified on refresh.
Features.signal_desc: Sort by time or price to capture the best entries fast.

Card.label: Lingbao Code
Card.copy_text: Lingbao Market: My cake price is {price}! Code [{code}], come quickly!

Notices.welcome_1: Welcome to <bold>Lingbao Market</bold> - The open price exchange.
Notices.welcome_2: Prices are updated in real-time by community submissions.
Notices.welcome_3: This project is open-source and free for everyone.
Notices.warning: Data is user-submitted and may vary from actual in-game prices.

Footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Lingbao Market. Open Source & Ad-Free.
